website_summaries.verdict: An all-inclusive design that consists of a chair, desk, and storage compartment. The best value for budget-conscious buyers.
pros: Sports colorful prints in a variety of popular cartoon characters
Integrated desk has a removable cup holder for easy access to kids' items
Seat features a built-in storage bin to keep art supplies organized
cons: Assembly instructions are unclear, making setup difficult

website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality Mickey Mouse desk that little ones will cherish for years. Exceptional value for the money.
pros: Clever all-in-one design creates a uniquely special place that kids can call their own
Desk features a cup holder for easy crayon access while drawing or for drinks with mealtimes
Seat with integrated storage bin lets little ones keep favorite items close at hand
Quality craftsmanship that's built to last
cons: Somewhat tricky to assemble, and the instructions could be clearer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of hardware issues
customer_reviews.text: Cute and feels sturdy... but the hardware is complete garbage. Broke when trying to put it together and had to go out and buy my own! This was after trying to figure out what these are even called (cam locks and nuts, if you need to know). The manufacturer doesn't offer email communication, initially was going to contact them for replacement hardware, but who has time to call during business hours?! Overall it's a nice piece, but the hardware is disappointing .
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a child favorite.
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this chair. My 2 year old son is autistic, and his therapist recommended this chair for him. I didn't have much hope that he would sit in it. He is very strange about stuff like that. But, he loves it! He will slide in and watch tv, eat his snacks, and best of all, they use it in therapy to do puzzles, etc. Its a great price for the sturdiness and size. My 5 year old daughter is 43 lbs and 43 inches and she has plenty of room. She sits all the time to draw and color. He will get a LOT of use out of this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jimjupiter

customer_reviews.title: Broken after light use. Made of cheap particleboard.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in this chair. My godson LOVES it. 2 stars for the colors and design. Zero stars for quality. He’s only used it maybe 3 weekends total since I bought it (when he visits us). He only sits in it to read and stores his little board books on the bottom. He’s a normal sized 2 year old. He doesn’t stand or jump in it. It isn’t moved around. The chair has broken in several places. Screws are obviously too heavy duty for the thin particle board. You can see in the photos how thin. Now I’m scrambling to find something similar of better quality before he comes over looking for his favorite chair.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so irritated with this product. None of the holes matched up. Very poorly constructed! My husband cut some spots to try and make it work and even though we got it together (for the most part- the desk part is bent because it’s the only way for it to work), I would never buy again. Only reason we kept putting it together is because I really didn’t want to undo all of it and put back in the box. It’s super cute, if only it was put together with an ounce of care.
customer_reviews.author: The Garners

customer_reviews.title: The baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: It took me about an hour to put together by myself because some things were a little awkward, but all in all not bad. The worst part was my grandson kept asking if I was almost done :) It seems very sturdy and plenty big enough for a 3 and a half year old to use for awhile. He really likes it, my only complaint is that he wants to put his feet on the bottom shelf so that pushes the drawer out the back. Maybe if I put some books in it then that won't be a problem, but I wish they had made the back closed in.
customer_reviews.author: Nickee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for your toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this chair! Needed something for my 2 year old son to be able to sit down in our livingroom to eat meals and this is perfect. He is quite big for his age and he fits with room to spare. We do coloring and painting at his little as well. It's very sturdy. He is still too young to understand that he shouldn't put all his weight on the desk portion and does this quite often and it has held strong. I also love the storage caddy at the bottom of the chair. Easy to keep well loved books and coloring books handy. Would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Alberes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough with proper use
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fairly easy following directions, you get the assembly process after a bit. Overall we’re satisfied. One thing to note. Got this for my 2 year old granddaughter who wants to climb on everything and of course climbed on the seat first thing and wanted to climb on to the desk top. The desk top, I think, is not sturdy enough for that kind of use and was not designed for that kind of use either. This is not a complaint of the desk just a note of caution. Otherwise easy to clean and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybear

customer_reviews.title: Cute but won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this toddler desk, however it’s made of particle board so the slightest bit of water/liquid gets on it and you can see it bubble already. Also the screws are all exposed, it would have been wise to add screw caps, so keep that in mind. A product meant for kids should be made durable enough to sustain normal usage, and definitely needs to be able to be handle being cleaned regularly.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: It might be worth it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be great because it was actually made from wood not particle board. My son got this for Christmas, it is March 21st. Not even 2 months and it's already in pieces. My son is not rough with this. I am very sad because this is his favorite chair. I would like to purchase another one to replace this but at the same time I am afraid to buy another one in case the same thing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Adleberg

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Had to change my original review. The first chair came broken, but was quickly replaced. The second one was in ok condition except for the fact that the chemical smell coming off it was overwhelming. My whole house smelled as my husband assembled it. I put it out to air it out and it didn’t help. I’m afraid to let my kids near it or have it in the house. There’s also a blue streak right down Mickey’s face and the desk seems flimsy. Had to disassemble and return. It’s a cute chair, but the smell makes it a one star rating and not worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Sjmama3

customer_reviews.title: Cute little chair, and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting on my husband to put it together and figured I would just give it a try since he was so busy. Wasn't hard at all. It gives clear directions on how to assemble. Took me about 30 min. It is adorable and my son loves his new chair. He is a tall almost 3 years old and fits fine in it. It was worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jasson Neeley

customer_reviews.title: heavy & stable
customer_reviews.text: First impression was how heavy and well built it is. The hardware included assures pieces are tightly and securely connected. Generously sized (advertised for age 3-6) yet at age 2 he is able to get in the seat and reach the desk, and will enjoy for years to come. It is sturdy enough that it will not tip over. We use the included cup to hold his fat crayons so he can use the desk surface for coloring books and have the crayons at hand. He likes the bin under the seat; it is generously sized and durable. As a grandparent, I appreciate the good construction and appearance (rather than bulky plastics). Exceptional value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kathos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and durability for toddler desk
customer_reviews.text: Both of my toddler sons enjoy this desk and began using it at ages much younger than the recommended age, with constant parental supervision. The desk has served multiple functions (as an activity table and even snack table) because of it's convenient size and the easy to clean glossy finish. Assembly was somewhat tedious, because the desk is made of dense fiberboard, but all of the special fasteners were supplied with the product. Though I would prefer traditional wood, this is much more durable and popular with my kids because of the colorful graphics. I was ready to buy this again, but my wife wants to teach our sons to share.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am far from handy but I decided to tackle putting this together today. It wasn’t too difficult but still took me around 2 hours to put together (Didn’t help having a toddler constantly trying to take the hardware and tools). It actually is cute and seems sturdy. The one thing that I do not like is the cup holder. It just sits in a hole and does not attach in anyway. Pretty useless. May have to find a way to glue it in to prevent toddler from removing it.
customer_reviews.author: M.K. 17

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material. Showed up scratched.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material. Came with various scratches all over. Very Disappointed, not worth 30+ dollars. Not very hard to put together but the screw inserts have to be exactly in the right spot or will not go in. Pain in the butt. Lol. All together not a great product and not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler/independent walker.
customer_reviews.text: This little desk assembled easily and is the perfect size for our toddler. The colors are bright and pretty, and the overall quality of the desk is good. It has a sturdy feel once assembled, and appears to safely withstand basic use--sitting, standing on the seat (as a climber will do), and dragging it from room to room. It's great as a table for snack time and as a desk for coloring or playing with toys. I would recommend it for a toddler who is an independent walker and beyond the stage of pulling up and surfing furniture for support.
customer_reviews.author: caspel

customer_reviews.title: Great little desk!!
customer_reviews.text: This little desk is a great purchase for little ones. We bought it two years ago, and out now 4 year old grandson still uses it daily. He loves Mickey on it, not that he just a Mickey fan. It is very sturdy. He puts his toys in the little drawer and usually his drink in the round hole on top. It’s a great place to have his snacks. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Our son really likes this desk. When we were putting it together one of the lock nuts broke, actually pretty much fell apart as we went to tighten it. The wood seems decent quality. I did not give this a 5 star because of the poor quality of the screws used to put it together. For the price it’s good but if the price was higher we would not buy it, probably won’t buy it again if something happened to this one. But for a first desk replacing a high chair we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair. This is actually my second chair. The first one was gifted to my 4 yr old. She eats her snacks on it , colors and play on this desk, does her homework, and even plays with her dolls ok n the desk. When it came to the poit that my 2 year old wanted to also sit there too, well you could imagine. The world has become a better place because my hubby and I decided to purchase one for the 2 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Jaelle Datilus

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter is a bit too small but loves it and manages to get on it constantly
customer_reviews.text: After buying it saw the picture showed a 3-4 year old sitting in it. Thought it would be too big for my granddaughter. Well I was happy to see her crawl into it at 16 months and love it. It's her personal library chair. She loves reading her books with a fine juice! She's now 21 months and still loves it as much if not more than when it was new. She's using the shelf for her favorite items. So it's going to be in use for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes learning fun.
customer_reviews.text: Every child should have one of these desks. They make learning so much more fun than siting at a boring table or desk. I purchased two - one is Sesame Street for my son (2) and one is Mikey Mouse for my nephew (3 and a half). They both love this desk and always want to sit in it. It requires assembly, but it's fairly simple. If you've assembled the smallest piece of furniture, you'll be totally ok assenting this one. I saw some bad reviews about the quality of the material and I have to disagree. Maybe they received a defective product, but both of the ones I purchased are of great quality. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute desk, poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The top of the desk had two holes much bigger than the screws provided. I called customer service to exchange the desk top but was told I had to return the entire desk. Since my husband had already assembled everything but that part, it would have meant dismantling everything so he used some filler and used the top anyway. The instructions were pictures only and very poorly explained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable wood
customer_reviews.text: Hard desk with storage drawer, flimsy drawer like the paper fabric but does what its designed to do. She can pull the drawer in and out easily. The cup comes out of the holder to easy she takes it out all the time. I guess that good to clean it. The cup is red thick plastic, think of tupperware. Holds crayons etc.. The desk was a good purchase. I like that its solid
customer_reviews.author: Mtnurse

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little set!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my nephew for his birthday. He refuses to eat at the table and this chair with table and storage cubby is perfect! It gives him a fun table and set to sit at and eat his meals while he watches tv. The cubby underneath is perfect to store his toys while he is eating his meals. It is a little wobbly around the table. That could be better attached however it’s easy to clean down and perfect for his needs!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: give yourself some time to assemble, instructions not very clear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little desk because my grand daughter has one at home and loves it, so I wanted one in my house for her visits. She uses it to draw, eat, and just likes sitting in something her size. Very cute and seems sturdy enough when assembled, but the assembly instructions are not very clear. I am pretty good at this kind of thing but it took me over an hour, a few swear words (thank goodness grand daughter wasn't here!) and a blood blister.
customer_reviews.author: Leni S. L. Wiener

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched
customer_reviews.text: The desk itself is nice, but the one I received has scratches AAAALL over it. Like a LOT of scratches. Looks like someone returned it. I was gonna return it as well, but this is the last Mickey one, and my 2-year old isn't too picky. It would be a nice desk if it weren't for these scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Delta children’s chair desk
customer_reviews.text: Is unbalanced, scratched and gouging on three of the four printed sides. Which means when washi G this unit the ware will seep under and lift and buckle also box was taped up like this was already returned . Put it together anyways as I can’t get ahold of company
customer_reviews.author: D. Fish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and cute and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: My, almost 2 year old, needed a safe spot to draw as opposed to the counterweight dining room table that we have. It has a holder for his markers and a place to store the large drawing pad down below. My son loves using it and then putting everything back away.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for my adorable 20 month old
customer_reviews.text: My mother purchased this for my 20 month old and he loves it, and so does my fiancé and I. It's nice and big so he will definitely get great use out of it. The only con is the assembly. The instructions were just..... all over the place but if you have time and patience, you should be okay. Thanks again gma for the chair. Your gson LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: AlexisMozell

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter love this desk eats, plays & watches tv on it alittle pricey but cute not flimsy but the top could have been bulted alittle better lean on it like kids do and it could break shes 2 yrs old but any older it most likely would snap off
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D

customer_reviews.title: It's cute but always seem to have some type of marks on them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of those. The First one came in and there is what looks like someone placed a sticker on the seat and rip It off along with the paint. The second one, It was cracked on the corner of the main table piece. It's not a huge deal but when you pay full price it should come perfectly for my kiddos. I don't have time to go in the post office and return all these items when you have 3 kids under 4. (Main reason I order online)The Assembly is a pain but whatever.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like pic. Has tons of room for my 2 year old to grow in.the desk park is a little flimsy rest is nice and sturdy. I wipe down with a baby wipe anything more wet may damage it. I plain in spraying a sealing spray to help protect it better to last longer
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Haines

customer_reviews.title: The colors are very vibrant and how doesn't love mickey. The cloth insert which slides under the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am the typical mom who has very little mechanical talents. I was able to assemble the Delta Childrens chair independently in only 20 minutes. My son's face lit up when he saw his desk. (he is two). The colors are very vibrant and how doesn't love mickey. The cloth insert which slides under the desk can be used to store their toys. ( We use it to store crayons and coloring books. The desk is sturdy and has a secure steady base. The desk is the perfect size for both my 2 year old and 5 year old. I would not purchase this for a child over 5 though due to the size of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: maury

customer_reviews.title: Funnest chair for the kids
customer_reviews.text: These Delta desks are 100% worth the money. From age 1 to 5 perfect for kids who won’t eat in their high chair. Gives them a sense of freedom and lets them grow and make their own decisions. I’ve bought 4 of these and they are wonderful. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Roy Tait

customer_reviews.title: A great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson for Christmas. It is the perfect size for him. And since he and his parents are huge Disney fans, it was a hit! It is well made. I’m sure it will be sturdy enough to last until he outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Mockingbird50

customer_reviews.title: Good place for a toddler to eat
customer_reviews.text: This seat is awsome I used it as a place for my 1.5 yr old to eat as it's perfect. The cup did come broke but isn't like my toddler wouldn't just break it anyways. And it was the only part that is plastic that's packed with fairly tough and heavy wood.i love the shine coat on this chair makes for an easy clean up. The droor on the bottom kinda just slips right out the back but we don't care about that mainly cared about durability and safety. Very sturdy seat
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended son loves it
customer_reviews.text: What really impressed me when I had opened the box to separate the parts etc as shown on the check list. All hard ware there were 1 extra of each. My take is just in case one of them might be faulty. My son loves it. Durable and quality 5+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: jg1

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old uses this chair to eat meals. I love it and he does too! It has plenty of room for him to grow. I wish that it had a small slit in the back for a parent to slide the hand in to make the chair easier to move around. If I had to have a complaint it would be with the cup holder. I think the chair would be better if it didn't have a cup holder at all. My son is constantly taking it out of the hole and not all cups fit in it. Overall this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong and heavy desk. My son is 21 months and a little over 3ft and it fits him well with room to grow. If yoh want to made sure that screws don't loosen up, just add a little wood glue when you're putting it together and that's badly for any piece of furniture that you're assembling. Nothing will budge.
customer_reviews.author: SurfGalore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but assembly needs extra effort!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 yr old grandson loves this desk but my husband wants to warn buyers we had to put in extra effort to assemble it. The graphics are gorgeous but the connection hardware is poor quality and several pieces broke with only reasonable tightening. My husband ended up barely tightening hardware and augmenting joining with construction adhesive. One piece also required shimming to fit properly. I wont recommend against buying - the desk we ended up with is beautiful and solid - but buyers should expect extra care and effort may be required to get a solidly-assembled desk that can stand up to a rambunctious child!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Full of Love!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sturdy Chair/Desk
customer_reviews.text: This is such a perfect little desk/chair. My grandson loves it. He is 18 months. He hated his high chair, so I got this and he loves being able to be the master of his own universe, so to speak. He also watches TV in it I was worried that it would be too hard, but he doesn't even seem to notice that it is not cushioned. I put surprises in his drawer and he loves it Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great desk.
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this desk. She sits and watches Caties Classeoom and colours. It’s a great little desk for the price. I will mention that the back is not that tall at all. Mine cuts off on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: ErinEli

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old granddaughter and she absolutely loves it! The chair is sturdy, easy to wipe down and she loves storing her favorite toys in the bin underneath. If I had a criticism, it would be that the back doesn't go all the way down, so the bin falls out of the back of the chair when she moves her feet, but that is a small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Beware this takes a while to put together but once you have it’s pretty indestructible. The wood is extremely heavy. My 2 year old loves to sit and color and eat snacks at his desk. Lithe cup won fit a drink. It’s more for pencils or crayons. I was really impressed with the quality of the wood and how inexpensive this was.
customer_reviews.author: ChickenCrazyMamaAmy15

customer_reviews.title: Nice high gloss finish!!
customer_reviews.text: Just delivered today and this thing is cool! An easy to assemble yet robust fastening system. I was really surprised with the quality of the high gloss finish (it has just enough texture to be durable and hide scratches). I was going to wait until Christmas to give it to my 18 month old daughter but I just couldn't resist and she has just taken right to it. Definitely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Strong and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty sturdy and quite heavy. It has a great look and looks very colorful. We bought it as a bday gift for our toddler and he seemed pretty excited. It's easy to assemble but the pictures on how to fix it are not great/immensely helpful. But it's not something that you cant figure out. It has a distinct smell when you open the package but it went away once we left it open for a while (the whole night).
customer_reviews.author: UK

customer_reviews.title: The issue is the chair itself has a pretty decent amount of weight to it but the cup ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves this little desk because he can get in and out of all by himself. It arrived quickly and my husband was able to put it together in a half an hour. The print is really cute with Mickey and friends plus shapes and colors. I deducted one star because the cup arrived broken, I kinda expected it though because of other reviews. The issue is the chair itself has a pretty decent amount of weight to it but the cup is cheap plastic and it gets crushed during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the cost
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his chair desk, it's where he eats, uses his tablet and color... however he's a boy which means he can wild at time (sigh). The desk part bends when he stands on it. hes about 35 lbs it could have been a bit more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Springer

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to clean... my 3yr old loves it, however he dont have very long left in it because it's not really suitable for older kids, maybe just for 4 and under
customer_reviews.author: Dreaana

customer_reviews.title: Cute but one wall came broken
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very nice but one of the parts came broken. Ordered both mickey and minney for my boy/girl twins. Minney came fine but mickey one had a crack on it. Contacted the company, waiting for a response on part replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AC12

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for sitting and having snack in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old and he LOVES it! It’s great for sitting and having snack in! However, it smells so strongly of chemicals that it stunk up my entire house. I put it outside for 24 hours hoping it would air out, washed it with wood cleaner and lots of water and brought it back in-it still smells! It smells terrible! I will have to return it if this smell does not go away!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: STURDY
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE PRETTY DURABLE. THE GRANDKIDS LOVE THEM. THE ONLY ISSUE I HAVE WAS THERE WERE A FEW SCRATCHES IN THE PICTURES AND ON THE EDGE OF THE TOPS . NOT SUPER NOTICEABLE, BUT EACH ONE HAS SCRATCHES OR A TEAR IN THE PICTURE. NOT SEVERE ENOUGH TO RETURN, THEY DO THEIR JOBS!!
customer_reviews.author: Marian Groff

customer_reviews.title: Love Disney
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars however it is hard for your child to get into the chair. You have to help/teach them how to sit at the desk it is kind of not enough room to easily slide into the seat
customer_reviews.author: Stella L. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those who HATES putting things together. Lol But I didnt mind with these. I bought two of them for grandsons; who are 5 and 3 years old. Thank you. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Chair sucks
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed and the construction of the chair More parts than needed directions sucked even after constructing the whole chair it has a little bit of wobble to it doesn't feel all that sturdy and the Screws keep loosening up... By the time I noticed all the scratches and the holes looked like something had already been screwed into it I was too frustrated and tired to and assemble it and return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My child loves this chair/table set
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old eats all of his meals at this chair and table set: it's easy for him to get on and off, cheerful design and pretty easy to clean after each meal. It was pretty easy to assemble - within 15 minutes I had it done. Worthwhile buy. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mickey chair . Also has storage underneath . Very sturdy and super easy to clean . My son hates the high chair this is perfect to put anywhere in the house and big enough to hold his drinks and a plate and snacks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: School work
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! I bought it for him for Christmas. But now with quarantine it is a great motivator for school work. He loves his special place to do his school work.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stewart

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his desk!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old about 3 years ago. He uses it ALL the time. He likes and uses it so much i sent one to my nephew for his 3rd bday. He loves his desk too!
customer_reviews.author: Milhouse

customer_reviews.title: Descent product but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Product came slightly damaged, but not enough to bother with a replacement. A pain to put together but that’s normal with these type products. Once assembled, it is descent. My son does really like it to draw and eat on.
customer_reviews.author: L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Well made, colors are vivid. Chair is sturdy, comfortable, and cheerful for kids. Grandchild love this chair wish would made in more cartoon characters with bright and vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Areen

customer_reviews.title: WAY Better than pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: The things I was most concerned about - ease of assembly and sturdiness - are not in question! I put it together in 15 minutes and it's solid!! The best part though, I was completely struck by how vibrant the colors and richness of the imagery. Our granddaughter absolutely loves it and we love having it in our home...she refers to it as her "desk for work." My wife and I both..."one of our good buys". Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to highchair
customer_reviews.text: As soon as your kid is able to walk sturdy I would suggest getting this they love how independently they can get into this. It's great for them to do everything color, eat , play. Great BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth perales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this chair, completely worth the price. He loves that he is able to get up and sit down as he pleases and not being strapped down to his high chair. I love the little storage compartment under the seat as well as the cup the chair comes with, we use it to put crayons in it. Completely recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Arambula

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! Was simple to put together. Colors are bright and it is very sturdy. Worry free cleanup and the storage bin in the bottom is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Just their size. Feels so grown sitting in own desk
customer_reviews.text: My grandson so enjoys his desk. East plays and sits in this all the time. Couldn't wait for mom & dad to finish putting it together before he tried to sit in it. Adorable. Plays on his little laptop sitting at desk. Good job
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: Nice product however there is a strong odor as soon as you open the box. The company should be ashamed of themselves. Someone used a black sharpie to cover the white scratches along mickeys ear. It’s not a big deal but it’s enough .
customer_reviews.author: TanyaF

customer_reviews.title: Child friendly
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great buy! My so. Has a table he can use! He eats there...draws too! Love it! Update: the side broke but it was so easy to order a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 2 year old and he won’t sit anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: It’s time consuming to put together and the instructions are a bit vague here and there but once it’s together it is very sturdy. My son uses it everyday, it’s the only place he will sit for snacks and sometimes meals. Would buy again if I had another 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This desk is heavier than expected which makes it sturdy. Very bright and clear design. So cute. My two year old granddaughter immediately sat on it when we presented it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The 3-year old grandson LOVED his chair. Actually tried to carry it everywhere he went! Already purchased another one for the granddaughter's birthday in 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: Sega Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: The colors are bright and sturdy. I liked this product but I’d recommend this only if you have a lot of patience and time to assemble. I did love the finished product and so did my son. I would definitely recommend but assembler beware.
customer_reviews.author: varun

customer_reviews.title: One chair- many uses.
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old grandson absolutely loves this chair. He sits in to eat his snacks and play with his toys. Also has a storage container for the toys under the seat. Easy clean up with the laminated surface.
customer_reviews.author: shawn a wolfe

customer_reviews.title: not confident in its sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: it’s a cute chair however, the instructions have no words (it is pretty simple but would be helpful). also, it only screws in the back the front feels like it could fall apart any second and did 3 times while i was putting together. i’m a little worried about letting my son even use it now. for the price i expected way better. mine also had scratches on the sides. not too noticeable but for being brand new it should not have any imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Product Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these deals for my twins learning center. I didn’t like the fact that the screws did not stay in place. Because the screws didn’t stay in place, it cause me the desk to not be sturdy and the pieces would constantly slide out of place. It’s just not a sturdy or durable product. I’ve only had this for 2 months and it’s already broken due to the pieces constantly sliding out of place because of the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great little desk. As expected it must assembled which is a pain in the neck. Good quality. My grandson eats and plays while sitting in it. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It seems really sturdy even though a couple of the metal pieces that go in the holes kept falling out. It doesn't seem to affect the desk stability. It wasn't super difficult to put together, except for those round metal things.
customer_reviews.author: Jayni abney

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler chair.
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for her godson, but we got the same one for my son like 2 years ago. Great toddler chair for eating and other activities.
customer_reviews.author: ONeil Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Baby boy loves this chair. Its a good size for him at 21 months. He can get in and out by himself. It seems to have plenty room for him to grow with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Target Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and durable but with a bad design
customer_reviews.text: Arrived slightly damaged-the red cup was broken in two. Takes a bit of skill to put together-also a could of the seams do not connect all the way. Artwork is colorful and it serves it's purpose. My 2 year old daughter has a bit of trouble sitting in it due to a strange design. It was a great price but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for toddler
customer_reviews.text: i bought these almost 2 years ago and my child loves it! it her desk and eating table! the cup has been lost but no biggie because her water cups fit in the hole with out falling! it really cute and well made! water and food has been dropped mutiple times and no signs of wear on it yet! easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself and it was extremely easy appears to be very sturdy and there was only one tiny scratch on it when we got it, so overall very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, sturdy, nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Have had for over two years (review is long overdue) and the chair is still in great shape. No issues with quality, has stood up to some abuse. Easy to clean, great Colors, very happy with it. Have purchased for others as gifts. Storage underneath is a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: Tania H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but putting this together was horrible!
customer_reviews.text: What I like: It's cute It took a rocket scientist to figure out how to put it together. Actually, 3 people. Hardware is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old grandson just LOVES this chair. He plays, draws, eats and falls asleep in his Mickey Mouse chair. It is easy to put together and is very sturdy. I highly recommend this chair and so does our grandson, Benjamin!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I love this items
customer_reviews.text: I love this items. Took 30 min tires to put together probably would have take less time if I was not accompany by little ones. Very good item to purchase for classroom setting for I home daycare. Very roomy can fit a 4 year comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Desks are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have bought two of these desks. I bought the Minnie Mouse desk at Christmas time for my great-niece and recently purchased the Mickey Mouse desk for my grandson. Both children are nearly two & they LOVE them! These are great for coloring, playing with toys or occasionally eating a snack in 💞
customer_reviews.author: Dr.V,PhD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap press board
customer_reviews.text: Built it and when I went to move it I picked it up by the writing desk portion..... it felt apart before it got across the room. If it doesn’t last against a proud dad how’s it going to hold up to an excited kid?
customer_reviews.author: R. Price Blalock

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect he can climb in and out
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 year old grandbaby. It's perfect he can climb in and out. Easy to clean. Great size he can still grow into it too. My only critique is the edge on the seat is a little sharp, I just put a little piece of foam where he climbs on to the chair to prevent him from getting that edge....problem solved
customer_reviews.author: SMN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my son. Took me about 45min to assemble. Its very sturdy and he likes it so much. I love Delta furniture. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Linh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This took forever to assemble and none of the nuts or screws fit. Husband had to go buy extra. The screws have already started working their way out of chair. None of the holes lined up either. Wish I had purchased something else.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Segura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a gift, helped assemble this as well and was fairly simple to piece together, kid loved his little chair
customer_reviews.author: miguel hernandez jr

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute desk/table. We got this to transition my 3-yr old son from the high chair to more of a table setting so he can start learning how to sit at a table. He loves that its Mickey. Works good for coloring and writing, etc. Not crazy bulky or takes up a lot of room. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maribell Flores

customer_reviews.title: It is nice but my little man is a little to small for it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice desk but the bin underneath the seat is not built very well and this is for bigger toddlers. Other than those things, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to receive this item, but I am very impressed with the quality of this desk! My son is 2 and it is perfect! I would highly recommend this for anyone looking for a quality piece of furniture for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Blaauboer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk but came with minor damage.
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but ours came in with knicks on multiple areas. It is super cute and we didn't unbox it until Christmas Eve so we kept and assembled it. My son is 1.5 years old and loves it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my nephew, but his parents absolutely love it! Easy to put together, id say about a half hour. It's extremely easy to clean, and i must say I was surprised by how sturdy it is. I loved it so much I bought the matching Minnie mouse one for my daughter :)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Mickey Mouse desk
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves anything Mickey Mouse and he’s not quite two years old but he absolutely loves this little desk he can’t eat out it and watch TV he can just play on it and said in front of the TV and watch TV it’s got a little pull out drawer that he can put his little treasures then I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce K Murotani

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, sturdy, and good value for money. Bought this for my daughter’s first birthday. She loves it. She sits and eats at her “table” often.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Table/Chair
customer_reviews.text: This table set has lasted for a year now. It is pretty sturdily built and cleans very easily. It makes a great place for the little one to eat. With the little drawer on the bottom you can store toys and things. It is a great buy to give the kids a place to eat. I recommend this to anyone looking for a little table/chair combo for their young children.
customer_reviews.author: D C

product_meta.title: Delta Children Chair Desk with Storage Bin, Disney Mickey Mouse
product_meta.description:
Style:Character| Color:Mickey MouseThis Mickey Mouse Chair Desk with Storage Bin from Delta Children was made for the Mickey-lover in your life. Boasting colorful graphics of Mickey and friends, it features a built-in cup holder for art supplies, and a storage bin underneath—keeping toys or books close at hand.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Disney Mickey Mouse Desk Chair Storage Bin is the perfect place to color, play, or study. The desk chair features a Mickey Mouse theme and makes a great gift idea. This toddler desk chair comes with a pull out under seat storage bin made of fabric. This bin opens up to reveal space for art supplies, books, and more. Stationary items such as pen, pencils and crayons can be stored in the cup holder provided.
feature_bullets: Recommended for ages 3 to 6 years; Holds up to 50 pounds
Made of engineered wood and fabric: Sits low to the ground for easy access
Features removable cup holder for art supplies and fabric storage bin: Wipe clean with a dry cloth
Scratch resistant finish protects the colorful graphics; Assembled dimensions: 20.47 length x 22.83 width x 23.23 height inches
Meets or exceeds all safety standards set by the CPSC
Removable storage bin under seat. Great for storing toys, books, and art supplies

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,488 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
